QuestData.Title: Good Help is Hard to Find
QuestData.Description: The excavation team is on strike!$b$bForeman Thazwix and his cronies think they can squeeze the Steamwheedle Preservation Society for some extra dough by refusing to work.$b$bWhat I need is a scab, a strikebreaker; someone to put some pressure on them by doing the job they refuse to do!$b$bGo down into the gorge, dig up some antiquities for me, and I'll pay you what I would have payed those lazy numbskulls!
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have the Nagrand Antiquities?
QuestData.RewardText: Great work, $n!$b$bThat bunch of good-for-nothing's came crying when they found out someone else was making their money! I don't think Thazwix, or his cronies, will be much trouble from here on out.$b$bAs promised, here's the pay I owe you for a job well done!
